name: Space Nature Attack Tower Defense
description:
Space Nature Attack TD is a traditional fixed path tower defense that allows you to gain resources per map completed which are used to level up your towers and customize them to suit your own strategies!


Customize your towers!



Distribute skill points among basic stats and a unique tower skill. Then select an element for the tower which will provide an additional effect such as a frost slow or faster electrical projectiles.


Twenty-four maps across three alien planet environments with scaling difficulties!



Each map features a unique modifier to keep gameplay fresh between different levels.

Six difficulty levels are included to provide increasing levels of challenge and
rewards (Including permanent bonuses!). Prepare to face invading monster types at higher difficulties.
